name: IcedCoffeeMix
description:
This is an initial test release of my new mix, It is a combination of four popular models, info on pedigree at the bottom.

So far it's been very versatile, it can do most species in a variety of styles. I highly recommend using it with the add detail Lora (not required, but think of it like a slider between cartoon to 2.5D).

Example prompt for the tracksuit lion image:

Prompt: (fluffy anthro furry), lion, fuzzy, soft, solo, 1girl, detailed face, detailed eyes, vibrant eyes, e621, tracksuit, sharply drawn, (pudgy:1.1), cinematic lighting, caustics, subsurface scattering, bloom, by foxovh, by mike mignola, detailed background

Negative prompt: (blurry, poorly drawn, out of focus, worst quality, low quality, logo, text, watermark, username), (extra limbs:1.35), (poorly drawn face:1.4), simple background, (human:1.1)

Steps: 35

Sampler: DPM++ 2M SDE Karras

CFG scale: 12

Clip skip: 1

Seed: 4269993828

Size: 320x448

VAE: orangemix.vae

Hires fix:

Denoising strength: 0.5

Hires steps: 30

Hires upscaler: 4x_foolhardy_Remacri

Hires upscale: 2

Note: i use tomes token merging to improve my performance, without it your results might not match mine directly, I'll include my settings below.

Token merging ratio: 0.5

Token merging ratio hr: 0.5

In addition I use an extension called "Self attention guidance"

SAG Guidance Scale: 1

SAG Mask Threshold: 1

Merge info:

https://civitai.com/models/24779/dark-sushi-mix-mix DarkSushiMix Brighter Pruned 55%

https://civitai.com/models/3671?modelVersionId=65078 YiffyMix 21 45%

https://civitai.com/models/51467/cutefurrymix CuteFurryMix v3 Colorbox + 45%

https://civitai.com/models/75445?modelVersionId=80182 Fluffusion r1 + 35%
